text: Robertus Wilhelmus Cornelis Eras (born 6 April 1954) is a Dutch equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Netherlands Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:People from Goirle
title: Rob Eras
